channel.title: Client and source download errors?... or mistakes by me
channel.description:
so, here i am. this is my problem: I downloaded winRAR, java JDK, etc. I did this on my other laptop, i started a server 100% fine. I switched laptops. i did the SAME EXACT thing that i did on my other laptop to start a server, and there is one problem: after i download using google chrome, i click on the source and client i downloaded at the bottom of the page, and it opens in a 'microsoft office word document'? isn't it supposed to like...save into a RAR file that i then need to extract and then edit? i honestly have no idea if i skipped a step in making a rsps or something, if so, just tell me what i need to do. idc if you flame this topic as long as i get an answer. pleaseeeee help meeee. (the reason i cant use my other laptop is because well, i basically dont own it anymore. lol)
PLEASE HELP. :)

item.source: Client and source download errors?... or mistakes by me

item.title: Client and source download errors?... or mistakes by me
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

ok some things are a bit unclear but ill try to help!

  1. are u sure the client and server you uploaded on laptop #1 was the correct server and client?

2.what site did u upload to?

  1. on laptop #2 once downloaded did the .zip or .rar file look like books or did it have a “W” logo?
  • if the .zip or .rar file had a “w” or opened word when u clicked the archive then you need to right click the .zip or .rar and click “open with” choose “Other” And choose a program u want most likely “winRar”
  1. were u sure that the download was 100% finished because when a download is not 100% done the extension will look like this “client.zip.part” and when u open it it will open with some weird programs. also do not think if u delete the .part it will fix the problem. it wont.

if your still having problems i can connect via teamviewer just pm me the problem your having (short) and your id and pass. (Make sure u set the settings to full access) and i wll fix the problem for you.

Brandon

Read full topic
